displayProperties.subtitle: The Shore's Only Law
displayProperties.description: Unlike his Fallen brethren, the clever Spider prefers to negotiate instead of fight.
displayProperties.name: Spider

BungieNet.Engine.Contract.Destiny.World..subtitle: The Shore's Only Law
BungieNet.Engine.Contract.Destiny.World..description: Unlike his Fallen brethren, the clever Spider prefers to negotiate instead of fight.
BungieNet.Engine.Contract.Destiny.World..name: Spider

interactions.flavorLineOne:
The Spider is determined to strengthen his hold on the Tangled Shore. If you found it in your heart to share his interest, he would make it worth your while.

Clear out enemies holed up in Lost Sectors on the Tangled Shore.
You can sense the Spider's hunger. It's unsettling. Best to move on before he consumes what you've made him.
The Spider is very interested in maintaining a strong friendship with you. You do him favors, he does you favors.

The Spider congratulates you on your victory—and himself on becoming the de facto power on the Tangled Shore.

He's feeling quite magnanimous at the moment, and would be happy to indulge in a bit of artifact repair by helping you fix Petra's Awoken talisman in quest "Key of Light and Darkness."
The Spider thanks you for cleaning up the Tangled Shore.

headerDisplayProperties.description: The Spider thanks you for cleaning up the Tangled Shore.
headerDisplayProperties.name: FLASHPOINT: TANGLED SHORE

interactions.flavorLineOne:
You've killed six of the eight Barons. Their deaths have forced the Machinist, the Fanatic's right hand, out of hiding.

Cross another name off your list in mission "The Machinist."

Spider always wondered what secrets lie within the Watchtower. That Uldren so clearly wants the treasures locked behind its doors only heightens his curiosity. Spider will even send a few of his associates to help you challenge the Scorn.

Seek your closure by completing mission "Nothing Left to Say."

You couldn't strike all the Barons' names from your list at once, but the Fanatic and his gang's time will come soon enough.

Stalk the Tangled Shore for those who defeated the legendary Vanguard Hunter by completing the Baron Hunt adventures: "The Hangman," "The Trickster," "The Rider," "The Mindbender," "The Mad Bomber," and "The Rifleman."

"The storied hero of the Red War, the rumored princekiller—working as a mule for the likes of the Drifter," Spider says. "My, my, how the mighty fall. I hope you know everything about your new friend's enemies." There is a pregnant pause. "You… did ask him about all that, didn't you?"

You say nothing as you reach casually to check the position of the heavy weapon slung across your back.

Recognizing the subtle threat, Spider sobers. "Well. Have a look at my wares, then."
Now that you and Spider are 'friends,' he gives you the location of the Scorned Barons' hideout. It's time to seek revenge and rob Uldren of his Barons by completing mission "Scorned."

"Don't see what you're looking for, my friend?" Spider asks, growing impatient. "Did your friend not tell you? When you pick up for the Drifter, you use the code words. You do not—"

You hold up your hand. Ghost transmats a Vanguard token into your waiting fingers. The message is clear: you stand with the Vanguard, not the Drifter.

Spider backpedals. "Now, now, my friend, I'm sure you can understand my position. Times are lean here on the Shore. And I'm but a simple businessman. I'll deal with anyone who comes through my door. If my business with the Drifter offends you so much, I would be pleased to cut off all relations with him… for the right price."

The Spider is willing to help you track down the Scorned Barons… but before he scratches your back, you'll have to scratch his. Take down a few escapees from the Prison of Elders. Then he'll give you the info on Uldren and his Barons that you need.

Complete five bounties for the Spider.
"Ah, the talisman is repaired. You must now attune it to that troublesome half of the Awoken's nature: the power you call Darkness." —The Spider

"Don't ask me to name my source, but a Guardian friend of mine is quite convinced the Scorn's Ether was corrupted by Darkness itself. Just what your little bauble needs if it's to get you to the Dreaming City, isn't it?" —The Spider

"Ah, the talisman… it's beautiful. I envy you, friend. With that lovely little bauble, you may now enter the Dreaming City. Give Petra Venj my… regards… won't you?

"I've taken the liberty of preparing you an escort. They are ready to march when you are." —The Spider

headerDisplayProperties.description: Speak with the Spider on the Tangled Shore.
headerDisplayProperties.name: Beyond the Watchtower

interactions.flavorLineOne:
It would appear the tainted gear is coming from a new Fallen syndicate that is also making a push on the Spider's turf.

Scavange the Shore for information about the syndicate, and the Spider will help you find the origin of the tainted gear.

The Spider and Siviks have history, but it seems that the Spider is ready to let go. He tells you where to look next: the EDZ.

Travel to the EDZ where the tainted Black Armory gear is sold and track down its source.
The Spider, kingpin of the Tangled Shore, has a favor to ask of you.
Complete various activities around the Tangled Shore, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic adventures.

headerDisplayProperties.description: Complete various activities around the Tangled Shore, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic adventures.
headerDisplayProperties.name: FLASHPOINT: TANGLED SHORE

interactions.flavorLineOne: The Spider, kingpin of the Tangled Shore, has a favor to ask of you.

"This bauble Petra gave you… it's missing pieces. I know because I've seen 'em before around the Shore. Seen folk kill for 'em, too. If I had one, I'd stash it in a Lost Sector to keep it safe. You understand me?" —The Spider

headerDisplayProperties.description: Petra gave you a talisman that will allow you to enter the Dreaming City. Inspect it in your inventory to begin a quest to mend and charge it.
headerDisplayProperties.name: Beyond the Watchtower
